structure.unit: STATE UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES -- REGIONAL EDUCATION -- ARCHAEOLOGY

law.catch_line: Limitations upon project funding in the Kentucky Commercialization Fund Program.
law.text:
Project funding in the Kentucky Commercialization Fund Program shall have the following limitations:
The maximum amount of funding for a project award under the Kentucky Commercialization Fund Program shall not exceed seventy-five thousand dollars ($75,000) each year up to two (2) years, equal to a maximum of one hundred fifty thousand dollars ($150,000); and
The University of Kentucky and the University of Louisville shall be awarded together no more than seventy percent (70%) of fund awards.
law.history: Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 98, sec. 7, effective July 15, 2008. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 522, sec. 16, effective July 14, 2000.
